original_title: Κολασμένες Ψυχές στα Δίχτυα της Ηδονής
overview: Tony Kouroglou responds to a job ad for working in a sea-side hotel. Hitchhiking his way to the hotel, he finds himself trapped in a murder case. He hastily disposes of the body and starts his new job. When he finds out that the people that framed him stay at the hotel, he becomes determined to expose them in order to keep himself out of jail.
title: Kolasmenes Psyches sta Dichtya tis Idonis
